# Load Libraries 

```{r}
if (!require(librarian)) {
  install.packages("librarian")
  library(librarian)
}

shelf(tidyverse,
      here,
      janitor,
      lubridate)
```

# Call Data

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-08-02')

frogs <- tuesdata$frogs %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(survey_date = as.POSIXct(survey_date, format = '%m/%d/%Y'))

```

# Explore Data

```{r}
summary(frogs)

unique(frogs$site)
unique(frogs$subsite)
unique(frogs$hab_type)
```
